segments.text: Can you fix me a cup of tea , Johnny ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well ... uh ... how about a glass of juice instead ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . I'd like tea . Can you put it in my favorite cup ? You probably washed it ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yeah . Well , uh , about your mug ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll find it ... Where are all the floral pattern plates ? And dad's Yankee's mug ?
segments.speaker: S1
